org.forgerock.openidm.datasource.jdbc.impl

Class JDBCDataSourceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.datasource.jdbc.impl.JDBCDataSourceService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceService

    public class JDBCDataSourceService
extends Object
implements DataSourceService
    A DataSource Manager for JDBC DataSources. This service exposes a DataSourceService for based on JDBC DataSource configuration. DataSources through JDNI, OSGi service-registration, non-pooled connections, and BoneCP are supported.

      • getBootService

        public static DataSourceService getBootService(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue config,
                                               org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context)
        Populate and return a DataSourceService that can be used before the config service is available.
        Parameters:
        config - the bootstrap configuration
        context - the bundle context
        Returns:
        the boot repository service. This newBuilder is not managed by SCR and needs to be manually registered.
